topic.title: Inject an inventory XML file to a server

body.p:
You can push a local generated inventory file to a server with the fusioninventory-injector command:
fusioninventory-injector est disponible avec l'agent que depuis la version 2.1.7.
fusioninventory-injector -v -f /tmp/toto-2010-09-10-11-42-22.ocs --url https://login:pw@yourserver/ocsinventory

If you want to use a HTTP proxy, you can declare it with the http_proxy environment variable:
export http_proxy=http://www-proxy:3128
